name: joi-extension-date-within
description: Adds within validation to enable you to specify how many days a from a value should be

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Jamie McConnell <jamie_mcconnell@icloud.com>
